name: Champion Hammer
description: A fortified hammer designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Defender Hammer I
description: A hammer crafted especially to fight off calamity. Modified so that anybody can use it.

name: Champion Hammer II
description: A fortified hammer designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Guardian Hammer
description: Used by village defenders, this hammer fortifies one's power to protect like castle walls.

name: Champion Hammer III
description: A fortified hammer designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura Hammer I
description: A hammer crafted in Kamura Village. It's somewhat gimmicky, but still strong.

name: Kamura Hammer III
description: A hammer crafted in Kamura Village. It's somewhat gimmicky, but still strong.

name: Kamura Hammer II
description: A hammer crafted in Kamura Village. It's somewhat gimmicky, but still strong.

name: Kamura Hammer IV
description: A hammer crafted in Kamura Village. It's somewhat gimmicky, but still strong.

name: Kamura Hammer V
description: A hammer crafted in Kamura Village. It's somewhat gimmicky, but still strong.

name: Kamura Ninja Hammer
description: A true Kamura masterpiece. It's lights out for anything that gets struck by this.

name: Kamura Warrior Hammer
description: A true Kamura masterpiece. It's lights out for anything that gets struck by this.

name: Kamura Warrior Hammer+
description: A true Kamura masterpiece. It's lights out for anything that gets struck by this.

name: Tooth Grinder
description: A hammer of menacing lethality. Keep bringing the pain, no matter how much they scream.

name: Duke Smiter
description: A Malzeno hammer, made more lethal through a tapered tip that crushes to the marrow.

name: Purity Hammer I
description: A hammer passed down from a princess who brought peace by dispelling evil.

name: Purity Hammer II
description: A hammer passed down from a princess who brought peace by dispelling evil.

name: Sinter Hammer
description: The Purity Hammer's enhanced form is a guiding light for a world lost in darkness.

name: Sinter Hammer+
description: The Purity Hammer's enhanced form is a guiding light for a world lost in darkness.

name: Enlightenment Hammer
description: Burn forevermore, my friend! May loved ones ne'er be lost with such a beacon!

name: Enlightenment Hammer+
description: Burn forevermore, my friend! May loved ones ne'er be lost with such a beacon!

name: Binding Bludgeon I
description: A hammer made from a shell soaked in Volvidon fluids. Spits out a paralytic agent.

name: Binding Bludgeon II
description: A hammer made from a shell soaked in Volvidon fluids. Spits out a paralytic agent.

name: Armored Gogue
description: Binding Bludgeon's enhanced form. Its paralytic agent is even more concentrated.

name: Armored Gogue+
description: Binding Bludgeon's enhanced form. Its paralytic agent is even more concentrated.

name: Armored Megagogue
description: All prey crumbles in a flash with this hammer's redoubled destruction and paralysis.

name: Armored Megagogue+
description: All prey crumbles in a flash with this hammer's redoubled destruction and paralysis.

name: Doom Bringer Hammer
description: An enhanced Almudron hammer. Can break any silence with its overwhelming power.

name: Almudron Hammer I
description: A hammer crafted from Almudron parts. Its ferocity sweeps foes off their feet.

name: Almudron Hammer II
description: A hammer crafted from Almudron parts. Its ferocity sweeps foes off their feet.

name: Hell Bringer Hammer+
description: An enhanced Almudron hammer. Can break any silence with its overwhelming power.

name: Magma Masher
description: A hammer made from real hot stuff. Its strikes have the power to shatter solid rock.

name: Hell Bringer Hammer
description: An enhanced Almudron hammer. Can break any silence with its overwhelming power.

name: Doomsday Hammer
description: A hammer so hard it can pulverize any foe into a haze of red mist.

name: Magma Masher+
description: A hammer made from real hot stuff. Its strikes have the power to shatter solid rock.

name: Volcanic Impact
description: A highly polished wheel-like hammer. Its burning fire both pulps and purifies.

name: Mighty Pronged Hammer
description: An enhanced Pronged Hammer. Famously able to smash any obstacle in its way.

name: Five-Pronged Hammer I
description: A Hammer made from Bishaten parts. It's said it protects those who are free of greed.

name: Mighty Pronged Hammer+
description: An enhanced Pronged Hammer. Famously able to smash any obstacle in its way.

name: Hallowed Pronged Hammer
description: True power comes from on high. And true power can destroy even formless foes.

name: Higher Pronged Hammer
description: A hammer that can relay the soul of the wielder. Each swing purifies evil.

name: Great Pronged Hammer
description: An enhanced pronged hammer. Famously able to smash any obstacles in its way.

name: Five-Pronged Hammer II
description: A Hammer made from Bishaten parts. It's said it protects those who are free of greed.

name: Peak Pronged Hammer
description: Hammer of the Great Tengu of myth. Its flames scorch greed and corruption from one's soul.

name: Wroggi Hammer I
description: A hammer that uses Wroggi poison. The serrated teeth can even rip through scales.

name: Heavy Hammer
description: Enhanced with a sharper blade and more powerful poison. Don't even let it nick you!

name: Dirty Hammer
description: A stronger, sharper, more venomous Wroggi hammer. Try not to touch it too much.

name: Dirty Hammer+
description: A stronger, sharper, more venomous Wroggi hammer. Try not to touch it too much.

name: Higher Pronged Hammer+
description: A hammer that can relay the soul of the wielder. Each swing purifies evil.

name: Wroggi Hammer II
description: A hammer that uses Wroggi poison. The serrated teeth can even rip through scales.

name: Gun Hammer II
description: A testament to modern tech. Powder in a revolving magazine explodes on impact.

name: Deadeye Revolver
description: The Gun Hammer's enhanced form. Perfect for the wanderer who bows to no one.

name: Break Revolver
description: The Gun Hammer's enhanced form. Perfect for the wanderer who bows to no one.

name: Break Revolver+
description: The Gun Hammer's enhanced form. Perfect for the wanderer who bows to no one.

name: Iron Hammer I
description: The trusty weapon of an old hunter before hammers were "in." Looks rather crude...

name: Burst Revolver
description: The indestructible becomes destructible with the symbiosis of hammer and revolver.

name: Iron Devil
description: A stronger iron hammer. Strikes with demonic strength and hellish fury.

name: War Hammer I
description: A hammer with a sharp tip. Its simple design belies the sheer power of its blows.

name: War Mace
description: An iron hammer with a sharp tip to increase deadliness. An easy weapon to obtain.

name: War Basher
description: War Stamp's enhanced form. Destroys giant boulders with ease. Warriors love it.

name: War Stamp I
description: Devoid of elemental power, but capable of destruction. Can crush wyvern skulls.

name: Astalos Sparkler
description: A powerful Hammer resembling an Astalos's crest. Only for those that refuse to fear the Astalos.

name: Astalos Sparkler+
description: A powerful Hammer resembling an Astalos's crest. Only for those that refuse to fear the Astalos.

name: Great Nova I
description: Made of the hardest of crystals. Absurdly priced, it is offered by the Guild.

name: Astalos Striker
description: The Astalos, trampling with echoing audacity. The king, trampling with defiant wrath.

name: Great Nova II
description: Made of the hardest of crystals. Absurdly priced, it is offered by the Guild.

name: Super Nova
description: Great Nova's enhanced form. Made from various ores and shines like a brilliant star.

name: Super Nova+
description: Great Nova's enhanced form. Made from various ores and shines like a brilliant star.

name: Hyper Nova
description: This jewel-hearted hammer of the most refined ores ushers in the birth of new stars.

name: Hyper Nova+
description: This jewel-hearted hammer of the most refined ores ushers in the birth of new stars.

name: Tigrex Hammer
description: An enhanced Striped Striker. Its roar rings through the land as it takes down foes.

name: Striped Striker II
description: Hammer made from Tigrex materials. One blow is enough to shatter the earth.

name: Striped Striker I
description: Hammer made from Tigrex materials. One blow is enough to shatter the earth.

name: Tigrex Hammer+
description: An enhanced Striped Striker. Its roar rings through the land as it takes down foes.

name: Huge Tigrex Hammer
description: So profound is the shockwave from this hammer, seismic chaos is said to ensue.

name: Huge Tigrex Hammer+
description: So profound is the shockwave from this hammer, seismic chaos is said to ensue.

name: Flaming Fury I
description: A hammer crafted from an Anjanath. A single hit feels like being swathed in flame.

name: Flaming Fury II
description: A hammer crafted from an Anjanath. A single hit feels like being swathed in flame.

name: Phoenix Fury
description: An enhanced Flaming Fury, plucked from the flames. One hit will burn foes to ashes.

name: Phoenix Fury+
description: An enhanced Flaming Fury, plucked from the flames. One hit will burn foes to ashes.

name: Phoenix Testament
description: An Anjanath hammer imbued with flaming fortitude. A single swing scorches the very earth.

name: Phoenix Testament+
description: An Anjanath hammer imbued with flaming fortitude. A single swing scorches the very earth.

name: Glacial Bash I
description: A freezing cold hammer capable of smashing great glaciers into splinters.

name: Glacial Bash II
description: A freezing cold hammer capable of smashing great glaciers into splinters.

name: Glacial Crunch
description: An enhanced Glacial Bash that crushes those who stand in its way, like a Barioth.

name: Glacial Blanche
description: A revised Glacial Crunch. Like a Barioth, it crushes all who stand in its way.

name: Kulu Bludgeon I
description: A hammer crafted from a Kulu-Ya-Ku beak. It's sturdy enough to crush rocks.

name: Glacial Blanche+
description: A revised Glacial Crunch. Like a Barioth, it crushes all who stand in its way.

name: Avalanche Ritter
description: An oppressive Barioth hammer that silences all around it with a devastating chill.

name: Kulu Bludgeon II
description: A hammer crafted from a Kulu-Ya-Ku beak. It's sturdy enough to crush rocks.

name: Kulu Crusher
description: An enhanced Kulu Bludgeon. Even the idea of a hit from this gives foes goosebumps.

name: Kulu Katolos Stick
description: A giant hammer granting a Kulu- Ya-Ku's grip. Its firm, refined will rejects all hardship.

name: Kulu Crusher+
description: An enhanced Kulu Bludgeon. Even the idea of a hit from this gives foes goosebumps.

name: Devil Masher I
description: Recall the old man who first hunted with a hammer; his pupil outdid him with this.

name: Devil Masher II
description: Recall the old man who first hunted with a hammer; his pupil outdid him with this.

name: Iron Devil's Respect+
description: An enhanced Devil Masher. Once wielded by a warrior of restored resplendence.

name: Iron Devil's Respect
description: An enhanced Devil Masher. Once wielded by a warrior of restored resplendence.

name: Unbearable Hammer II
description: A hammer made from Arzuros parts. Reinforced with iron, it packs quite the punch.

name: Unbearable Hammer I
description: A hammer made from Arzuros parts. Reinforced with iron, it packs quite the punch.

name: Iron Devil's Soul
description: An enhanced Devil Masher. Said to have been wielded by a warrior even in undeath.

name: Iron Giant's Soul
description: A golden hammer of true radiance. Bares the power of a divine hammer wielder.

name: Barbearic Hammer
description: Enhanced Unbearable Hammer. Made from sturdy stuff, it's earth-shatteringly strong.

name: Barbearic Hammer+
description: Enhanced Unbearable Hammer. Made from sturdy stuff, it's earth-shatteringly strong.

name: Frilled Blow II
description: A hammer made of Somnacanth parts. It strikes its foes with a mermaid's dark zeal.

name: Frilled Blow I
description: A hammer made of Somnacanth parts. It strikes its foes with a mermaid's dark zeal.

name: Bearly Eyhammer
description: A fellmace using choice Arzuros materials. Evokes the fearsome war cry of a mountain king.

name: Illusory Frilled Blow+
description: Enhanced Frilled Blow. Its nereid grudge drags foes into a nightmarish abyss.

name: Illusory Frilled Blow
description: Enhanced Frilled Blow. Its nereid grudge drags foes into a nightmarish abyss.

name: Nightmare Frilled Blow+
description: A hammer that sends its prey off into nightmares with a fierce thud.

name: Nightmare Frilled Blow
description: A hammer that sends its prey off into nightmares with a fierce thud.

name: Bloom Snow Blow
description: A hammer that looks like an ugly fist, clenched around Aurora Somnacanth hatred.

name: Flicker Blizzard Blow
description: The blue light from this hammer is pure Somnacanth resentment. All must suffer!

name: Bloom Snow Blow+
description: A hammer that looks like an ugly fist, clenched around Aurora Somnacanth hatred.

name: Bag o' Horrors I
description: A smelly hammer bundled in Khezu hide. Best not to try peering inside it too close.

name: Bag o' Horrors II
description: A smelly hammer bundled in Khezu hide. Best not to try peering inside it too close.

name: Bag o' Booms
description: A monstrous, repulsive Khezu hammer, causing all to behold it to faint.

name: Bag o' Thunder+
description: The enhanced Bag o' Horrors has a Khezu power generator. No one knows what's inside.

name: Bag o' Thunder
description: The enhanced Bag o' Horrors has a Khezu power generator. No one knows what's inside.

name: Bag o' Booms+
description: A monstrous, repulsive Khezu hammer, causing all to behold it to faint.

name: Frozen Core II
description: A hammer with a frozen core. So cold, touching it will freeze unprotected hands.

name: Niflheim+
description: Frozen Core's enhanced form. So cold that striking a lake will freeze it over.

name: Cocytus
description: Frozen Core's enhanced form. So cold that striking a lake will freeze it over.

name: Frozen Core I
description: A hammer with a frozen core. So cold, touching it will freeze unprotected hands.

name: Pykrete Punisher
description: A mallet with a core forged from frozen earth. The cold air it emits is enough to freeze all.

name: Hammer of Winter Moon
description: Embodying Lunagaron's ferocity, it releases cold air in preparation for slaughter.

name: Niflheim
description: Frozen Core's enhanced form. So cold that striking a lake will freeze it over.

name: Hammer of Winter Moon+
description: Embodying Lunagaron's ferocity, it releases cold air in preparation for slaughter.

name: Hammer of Snowfallen
description: A hammer that feeds on the flesh of its prey. The surrounding air becomes frozen in its presence.

name: Bone Hammer II
description: Hammer made from superior quality bone. Boorish, but proves its material's power.

name: Bone Hammer I
description: Hammer made from superior quality bone. Boorish, but proves its material's power.

name: Hard Bone Hammer
description: Bone Hammer's enhanced form. Made from top quality bones for unparalleled power.

name: Bone Bludgeon I
description: A crude hammer crafted from a massive bone. Its strength becomes apparent with use.

name: Bone Bludgeon II
description: A crude hammer crafted from a massive bone. Its strength becomes apparent with use.

name: Heavy Bone Bludgeon
description: The Bone Bludgeon's final form. Still crude, but it is greatly improved otherwise.

name: Diablos Hammer I
description: A hammer crafted entirely from a Diablos tail. Offers superb defensive strength.

name: Diablos Hammer II
description: A hammer crafted entirely from a Diablos tail. Offers superb defensive strength.

name: Diablos Maul+
description: An enhanced Diablos Hammer. This masterpiece is truly a Diablos tail incarnate.

name: Diablos Tail
description: An enhanced Diablos Hammer. This masterpiece is truly a Diablos tail incarnate.

name: Finishing Hammer
description: Destruction and brutality embodied in the form of a horned beast's tail.

name: Cyclo-Hammer I
description: Crafted from superior bone, this hammer boasts improved attack. The standard-bearer.

name: Cyclo-Hammer II
description: Crafted from superior bone, this hammer boasts improved attack. The standard-bearer.

name: Atlas Hammer
description: An enhanced Cyclo-Hammer. Improved enough to make it the apex of bone hammers.

name: Finishing Hammer+
description: Destruction and brutality embodied in the form of a horned beast's tail.

name: Atlas Hammer+
description: An enhanced Cyclo-Hammer. Improved enough to make it the apex of bone hammers.

name: Atlas Crusher
description: Hammer crafted from the blue ribbon of bones. Ultra-dense, and absurdly destructive!

name: Atlas Crusher+
description: Hammer crafted from the blue ribbon of bones. Ultra-dense, and absurdly destructive!

name: Ceanataur Head Axe+
description: Made from tough-to-work-with Shogun head pieces. It's designed for ease of use.

name: Ceanataur Head Axe
description: Made from tough-to-work-with Shogun head pieces. It's designed for ease of use.

name: Big Blue Chopper
description: Enhanced form of the Ceanataur Head Axe. A powerful bone hammer, it can smash any target it faces.

name: Matraca Hammer
description: A hammer forged from the scales of a Seregios. Capable of reducing foes to dust.

name: Matraca Hammer+
description: A hammer forged from the scales of a Seregios. Capable of reducing foes to dust.

name: Argyl Hammer
description: An upgrade of Matraca's Hammer. The sign of a revolutionary, as its strength seeks change.

name: Pukei Hammer I
description: A hammer made of Pukei-Pukei parts. Its shape shows just how skilled the maker was.

name: Datura Club+
description: An enhanced Pukei hammer. Crushing, poisonous blows strike fear into its foes.

name: Datura Pounder
description: A hammer of hardened Pukei- Pukei gular skin. Its toxic blows attack from the inside out.

name: Datura Pounder+
description: A hammer of hardened Pukei- Pukei gular skin. Its toxic blows attack from the inside out.

name: Basarios Blow II
description: A hammer crafted using the hardest part of a young Basarios's face plating.

name: Basarios Blow I
description: A hammer crafted using the hardest part of a young Basarios's face plating.

name: Pukei Hammer II
description: A hammer made of Pukei-Pukei parts. Its shape shows just how skilled the maker was.

name: Basarios Bash
description: An enhanced Basarios Blow. The well-crafted dragon face plating is really scary.

name: Red Bludgeon I
description: A superb article made from a Rathalos head. Only the bravest can wield it.

name: Red Bludgeon II
description: A superb article made from a Rathalos head. Only the bravest can wield it.

name: Huracan Hammer
description: The Red Bludgeon's enhanced form features many upgrades. It cannot be tamed.

name: Huracan Hammer+
description: The Red Bludgeon's enhanced form features many upgrades. It cannot be tamed.

name: Rathalos Cosh
description: Dwelling deep in the mountains, keeping intruders at bay. There's no turning back for all who enter...

name: Rosenhammer
description: A hammer making striking use of an Espinas head. Thorny rage smashes everything.

name: Rosenhammer+
description: A hammer making striking use of an Espinas head. Thorny rage smashes everything.

name: Rosenunwetter
description: The horned Espinas skull used to forge this weapon still retains memories shrouded in fury.

name: Yeti Hammer I
description: An icy Goss Harag hammer. Let your instincts loose and crush your foes!

name: Yeti Hammer II
description: An icy Goss Harag hammer. Let your instincts loose and crush your foes!

name: Yeti Hammer III
description: An icy Goss Harag hammer. Let your instincts loose and crush your foes!

name: Abominable Buster+
description: An enhanced Yeti Hammer. Be like Goss Harag— don't think, just smash!

name: Abominable Avalanche
description: Riding Goss Harag can make you want to punch like one; this is the next best thing.

name: Abominable Buster
description: An enhanced Yeti Hammer. Be like Goss Harag— don't think, just smash!

name: Usurper's Thunder I
description: A hammer modeled after an evil thunder god. One swing can reduce lives to dust.

name: Abominable Hammer
description: An enhanced Yeti Hammer. Be like Goss Harag— don't think, just smash!

name: Usurper's Thunder II
description: A hammer modeled after an evil thunder god. One swing can reduce lives to dust.

name: Despot's Crackle
description: The enhanced Usurper's Thunder. Forces enemies to bow before the thunder god.

name: Despot's Crackle+
description: The enhanced Usurper's Thunder. Forces enemies to bow before the thunder god.

name: Oppressor's Sway
description: A hammer mightier than the gods. It shatters the heavens and engulfs the sky in clouds.

name: Calamitous Portent I
description: An eerie hammer featuring two intertwined Remobra. It feels quite foreboding.

name: Calamitous Portent II
description: An eerie hammer featuring two intertwined Remobra. It feels quite foreboding.

name: Catastrophic Portent
description: An enhanced Calamitous Portent. It brings disaster with every swing.

name: Catastrophic Portent+
description: An enhanced Calamitous Portent. It brings disaster with every swing.

name: Cataclysmic Portent
description: A possessed hammer. Legend says it was wielded by an ancient hunter who vanquished evil.

name: Droth Splashhammer II
description: A hammer of Ludroth sponge. The water inside explodes onto the target on impact.

name: Ludroth Dousehammer
description: The Ludroth Splashhammer's enhanced form. Crushes foes like a tsunami.

name: Droth Splashhammer I
description: A hammer of Ludroth sponge. The water inside explodes onto the target on impact.

name: Ludroth Dousehammer+
description: The Ludroth Splashhammer's enhanced form. Crushes foes like a tsunami.

name: Lorelei
description: Named after a fairy, it is said that glimpses of a Royal Ludroth can be seen in this hammer's fury.

name: Golm Gavel
description: A hammer capable of dealing heavy blows and creating mighty shock- waves, as if struck by a Garangolm.

name: Lorelei+
description: Named after a fairy, it is said that glimpses of a Royal Ludroth can be seen in this hammer's fury.

name: Gornir
description: A hammer of elaborate and sturdy construction. Some say it's attacks rival that of a Garangolm's assault.

name: Golm Gavel+
description: A hammer capable of dealing heavy blows and creating mighty shock- waves, as if struck by a Garangolm.

name: Izuchi Hammer II
description: A hammer crafted from Izuchi parts. Its countless blades rip through foes with ease.

name: Izuchi Hammer I
description: A hammer crafted from Izuchi parts. Its countless blades rip through foes with ease.

name: Snapper Hammer
description: An enhanced Izuchi hammer. The sharp blades whip up a storm with just one swipe.

name: Snapper Hammer+
description: An enhanced Izuchi hammer. The sharp blades whip up a storm with just one swipe.

name: Blower's Hammer
description: A mighty hammer with a grim sickle blade that sprays its prey's blood all around.

name: Hidden Breaker I
description: A hammer as black as night. Each swing bears the weight of impending darkness.

name: Hidden Breaker II
description: A hammer as black as night. Each swing bears the weight of impending darkness.

name: Night Eternal
description: Hidden Breaker's enhanced form. Deals blows that trap prey in eternal darkness.

name: Endless Eternia
description: A hammer as dark as night. The souls it has consumed are sublimated with cruelty.

name: Avidya Breaker
description: A weapon forged by an ancient evil. With every attack, it envelops and consumes its prey in darkness.

name: Endless Eternia+
description: A hammer as dark as night. The souls it has consumed are sublimated with cruelty.

name: Carapace Hammer I
description: A hammer resembling Barroth head armor. Strong enough to crush steel.

name: Carapace Hammer II
description: A hammer resembling Barroth head armor. Strong enough to crush steel.

name: Barroth Charger
description: An enhanced Barroth Hammer. Its destructive power can smash things to smithereens.

name: Barroth Hammer
description: An enhanced Carapace Hammer. Its destructive power can smash things to smithereens.

name: Barroth Momentum
description: Born of a hell-bent pursuit of devastation, this demon crushes all in its path.

name: Sinister Hammer I
description: A hammer made from Magnamalo parts. This demonic weapon is shaped like old armor.

name: Barroth Charger+
description: An enhanced Barroth Hammer. Its destructive power can smash things to smithereens.

name: Sinister Hammer II
description: A hammer made from Magnamalo parts. This demonic weapon is shaped like old armor.

name: Sinister Shade Hammer
description: Within this hammer exists a vengeful spirit, roused by a memory of a grudge ages old.

name: Sinister Shade Hammer+
description: Within this hammer exists a vengeful spirit, roused by a memory of a grudge ages old.

name: Mighty Souldevourer
description: Awakened spirits turn to wyvern-wasting demons as prayers fall on deaf ears.

name: Devil's Die
description: Conquer evil with evil. Renewed devilry gives this weapon its name.

name: Wuchtblick
description: An ominous Hammer adorned with a menacing skull. The hidden eye shall never open.

name: Wuchtblick+
description: An ominous Hammer adorned with a menacing skull. The hidden eye shall never open.

name: Ächtungsblick
description: A hammer said to control time. It casts a shadow that'll plunge the world into nothingness.

name: La Terre
description: The golden claws represent the end of all things, and the massive stone, rebirth.

name: Egg Hammer I
description: This hammer smashes the idea that hammers should be hard. Strangely, it never breaks.

name: Egg Hammer II
description: This hammer smashes the idea that hammers should be hard. Strangely, it never breaks.

name: Gargwa Hammer
description: The unbreakable Egg Hammer's enhanced form. Surely it has to break eventually...?

name: Le Jugement
description: A Hammer whose head is pure Shagaru Magala material. The claw holding it never opens.

name: Gargegg Hammer
description: Will the egg hatch? No, this is no longer an egg. This is a ferocious hammer of the Gargwa.

name: Gargwa Hammer+
description: The unbreakable Egg Hammer's enhanced form. Surely it has to break eventually...?

name: Mane Malice I
description: Sleeping lion or leering demon? Your heart decides this hammer's countenance.

name: Mane Malice II
description: Sleeping lion or leering demon? Your heart decides this hammer's countenance.

name: Mane Malice Rajang
description: An enhanced Mane Malice. This hammer is perfect for warriors in search of war.

name: Mane Malice Rajang+
description: An enhanced Mane Malice. This hammer is perfect for warriors in search of war.

name: Demonlord Sledge
description: A hammer with a countenance as hard and ruthless as a Rajang's. Even gods flee from it.

name: Abyssal Gale Mauler
description: Enhanced Azure Elder Hammer. Foes felled by this face the divine judgement of Ibushi.

name: Azure Elder Hammer II
description: A hammer embodying the anger of Ibushi. Even one blow can shake the earth beneath it.

name: Skyfold Boldblow
description: Courage rocks the earth. Fear rocks the heavens. Gods crumble by such blows.

name: Abyssal Storm Mauler
description: Wielders hold Narwa's power over life and death. Make sure it doesn't corrupt you.

name: Thunderbolt Hammer I
description: This aberration of a hammer carries with it Narwa's rage and thunderous power.

name: Skyfold Furyflash
description: Rage rocks the earth. Sorrow rocks the heavens. Gods crumble by such blows.

name: Icesteel Hammer I
description: A weapon made by fusing Kushala Daora materials with an ancient hammer.

name: Daora's Colossus
description: The Icesteel Hammer's final form. Unleashed a wave that wiped out a civilization.

name: Daora's Colossus+
description: The Icesteel Hammer's final form. Unleashed a wave that wiped out a civilization.

name: Daora's Hyperborea
description: This smooth, alluring beauty condemns foes to being sealed in eternal ice.

name: Teostra Cratergouger
description: An enhanced Teostra Cratermaker. Has decimated entire kingdoms.

name: Teostra Cratermaker I
description: A hammer as imposing as Teostra. One swing can reduce castles to rubble.

name: Teostra de la Torre
description: As tall as a tower, this lofty Cratermaker evolution pummels the earth to dust.

name: Genie's Expanse I
description: A demonic hammer resembling a Chameleos head. The tank releases toxins on impact.

name: Diamalto's Dream
description: An enhanced Genie's Expanse. Combines powerful poison with crippling blows.

name: Teostra Cratergouger+
description: An enhanced Teostra Cratermaker. Has decimated entire kingdoms.

name: Diamalto's Dream+
description: An enhanced Genie's Expanse. Combines powerful poison with crippling blows.

name: Diamgolgo's Phantasm
description: With eerie calm, life is extinguished by this toxic hammer of the gods.

name: Redwing Drill I
description: A hammer made from Valstrax wings. Its draconic spirit packs a tremendous punch.

name: Reddnaught Hammer
description: This hammer's shock force hits like a meteorite, causing catastrophic damage.

name: Abyssal Windstorm
description: Fourteen terrors from the black abyss. The seventh was a wind to wipe all away.

name: Crimson Forcewing
description: This hammer's shock force hits like a meteorite, causing catastrophic damage.

name: Teddybear I
description: A stuffed animal popular among ladies living in Guild towns. Cuddle time?

name: Teddybear II
description: A stuffed animal popular among ladies living in Guild towns. Cuddle time?

name: Sleepy Bear
description: Teddybear's enhanced form. Has helped countless girls drift off to dreamland.

name: Sleepy Bear+
description: Teddybear's enhanced form. Has helped countless girls drift off to dreamland.

name: Dreamy Bear
description: A huggy bear who induces the ultimate sleep. Why, some targets never wake up again!

name: Graceful Death I
description: A weapon resembling the hand of an evil spirit. Grips the souls of those it has reaped.

name: Yadora Morte+
description: Graceful Death's enhanced form. Even more evil—seals its user's fate immediately.

name: Graceful Death II
description: A weapon resembling the hand of an evil spirit. Grips the souls of those it has reaped.

name: Yadora Morte
description: Graceful Death's enhanced form. Even more evil—seals its user's fate immediately.

name: Graceful Death III
description: A weapon resembling the hand of an evil spirit. Grips the souls of those it has reaped.

name: Dark Morte
description: A hammer that has gained the power of darkness to control the evil that yet inhabits it.

name: Pumpking I
description: Creepy yet comical, a hammer with a face hard to hate. Even wards off evil spirits.

name: Pumpking II
description: Creepy yet comical, a hammer with a face hard to hate. Even wards off evil spirits.

name: Jack-'o-lantern King+
description: An enhanced Pumpking. Once used by a king to purify and befriend evil spirits.

name: Jack-'o-lantern King
description: An enhanced Pumpking. Once used by a king to purify and befriend evil spirits.

name: Magic Pumpking
description: An enhanced Jack-'o-lantern King. A hammer that has earned the title of king of all demons.

name: Royal Order's Bludgeon
description: A hammer used by knights of the Order. Only those with unrivaled strength may wield it.

name: Antique Machina H
description: Hammer of emerald and gold furnished with a mechanism utilizing afflicted energy.

name: Rampage Hammer I
description: Despite its fierce guise, the varied power this hammer flaunts is kaleidoscopic.

name: Royal Order's Bludgeon+
description: A hammer used by knights of the Order. Only those with unrivaled strength may wield it.

name: Rampage Hammer II
description: Despite its fierce guise, the varied power this hammer flaunts is kaleidoscopic.

name: Rampage Hammer V
description: Despite its fierce guise, the varied power this hammer flaunts is kaleidoscopic.

name: Rampage Hammer S
description: Life, loss, birth... This world is in a constant state of flux, as is this hammer.
